physical_appearance:This clipping is a page from the periodical \u0027The Orient Illustrated Weekly\u0027. The page is titled \u0027On the Newsfront\u0027. It includes a collection of black-and-white photographs of cadet officers from the Indian National Army. The keft edge of the page is slightly torn.

metadata.physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly'. The page is titled 'On the Newsfront'. It includes a collection of black-and-white photographs of cadet officers from the Indian National Army. The keft edge of the page is slightly torn.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: "Prior to the World War II period, Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political, sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions, inspired by the ""call for freedom"" in India
